org.ingatan.component.image.optionpanes
Class ShapeDrawOptionPane

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.ingatan.component.image.optionpanes.ShapeDrawOptionPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, OptionPane
public class ShapeDrawOptionPane
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements OptionPane

Displays all options for drawing shapes. Options are:

  • Line style: selected from a ThumbnailPane of several available
  • Fill style: stroke and fill, stroke only, fill only

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham
See Also:
Serialized Form

getDrawPolicy

public int getDrawPolicy()
Gets the way in which the shape should be drawn. Three options are available here: fill and stroke, fill only, and stroke only.

Returns:
a value indicating the drawing policy; compare this with the static fields of this class.
